item.title: 2. Sykdomspulsen
item.description: true library(sykdomspuls) ## PACKAGE: sykdomspuls ## Version 2019.08.19 at 11:53 ## Developed by Richard White, Gunnar Ro ## Department of Infectious Disease Epidemiology and Modelling ## Norwegian Institute of Public Health ## https://folkehelseinstituttet.github.io/dashboards_sykdomspuls/ sykdomspuls requres a specific raw data format. We require one (or less) rows for each structural variable: print(as.character(sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_STRUCTURAL)) ## character(0) For each row, the variables saved in sykdomspuls::CONFIG$SYNDROMES and sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_OTHER contain the number of consultations that occurred for that combination of structural variables.

item.title: 1. Infrastructure
item.description: Executive summary The dashboards project is a project at FHI concerned with running automated analyses on data. In principle, the dashboards project is split up into two parts: The umbrella infrastructure (i.e. Docker containers, continuous integration, chron jobs, etc.) The R package for each automated analysis What is an automated analysis? An automated analysis is any analysis that: Will be repeated multiple times in the future Always has an input dataset with consistent file structure Always has the same expected output (e.
